REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1298 reute r f BC-DAXOR-<DAXR.O>-IN-FED 06-19 0059

TEXT.TITLE: DAXOR <DAXR.O> IN FEDERAL EXPRESS <FDX> DEAL
TEXT.BODY: Daxor Corp said it has received an offer from Federal Express Corp to establish a national frozen blood bank at Federal's Memphis, Tenn., headquarters. The company said its blood could be shipped anywhere in the U.S. within six hours from Memphis via Federal Express' delivery system. Reuter
